text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work today.

vocabulary.meaning: thank you for your hard work

text: よし! 原因無事帰還! / 作戦大成功っす!
translation: Alright! Everyone returned safely! / Mission accomplished!
grammar: っす is casual form of です

text: 星を救う、でっかい始める一歩だ! / うん! / お前ら!
translation: This is the first big step to saving the planet! / Yeah! / You guys!

text: ピーヒャラ喋るんじゃねえ! / 捕まるぞ! / カラペ!
translation: Stop yapping! / You'll get caught! / Scatter!
grammar: んじゃねえ is rough masculine prohibition (don't do)

text: うん、次の作戦まで自由行動!
translation: Yeah, free time until the next mission!

text: 最高にうまいもんでも食っとけ! / うん! / うん!
translation: Go eat something delicious! / Yeah! / Yeah!
grammar: 食っとけ is casual imperative of 食っておく (eat beforehand)

text: 一気に入れる
translation: Going all in at once.

text: ライト
translation: Light.

text: どういう人だろう
translation: I wonder what kind of person they are.
grammar: だろう expresses wondering/speculation

text: プレートとスラムで差がある
translation: There's a difference between the Plate and the Slums.

text: 魔晄炉? / 八番街がれきで道が塞がっちまったよ
translation: Mako reactor? / The road's blocked by rubble from Sector 8.
grammar: ちまった is casual contraction of てしまった

text: 魔晄は星を巡る地って言われてもな
translation: Even if you say Mako is the lifeblood of the planet...
grammar: って言われてもな expresses skepticism about what's being said

text: 剥がしても剥がしてもすぐ元通り
translation: No matter how many times you peel them off, they're back right away.
grammar: ても...ても pattern means 'no matter how much'

text: 妄想じみた主張はともかく / しつこさには頭が下がるよ
translation: Setting aside their delusional claims / I have to hand it to their persistence.

vocabulary.meaning: to admire, take one's hat off to

grammar: はともかく means 'setting aside' or 'regardless of'

text: 見ろよ あの美しい鉄骨 / たまんねえな
translation: Look at those beautiful steel beams. / Can't get enough of it.

vocabulary.meaning: can't stand it (in a good way), irresistible

grammar: たまんねえ is casual/masculine form of たまらない

text: おい あんた どうした
translation: Hey, you there. What's wrong?

text: 魔晄中毒かよ
translation: Mako poisoning, huh.
grammar: かよ adds emphasis/exasperation

text: またあいつか
translation: That guy again.

text: すすまみれふんじんまみれ / おまけに疲れてドロドロだ
translation: Covered in soot and dust / Plus I'm exhausted and filthy.
grammar: まみれ means 'covered in'

text: 待ってろシャワー / 俺はとにかくご飯ご飯
translation: Wait for me, shower. / I just want food, food.

text: 危険 / ゲート不具合によりモンスター多数滞留 / この先に用はない
translation: Danger / Many monsters gathered due to gate malfunction / No business ahead.

text: 戻るか
translation: Should I go back?
grammar: か at end makes it a question to oneself

text: あの / 現在緊急事態につき
translation: Um, / Due to the current emergency...

text: こちらは通行禁止になっています / すみません
translation: This area is currently off-limits. / Sorry.

text: もっと堂々とせんか / はい
translation: Stand more confidently! / Yes sir!
grammar: せんか is emphatic command form

text: すげえ
translation: Awesome.
grammar: すげえ is casual form of すごい

text: マリー
translation: Marlene.

text: 父ちゃんお帰りなさい / ただいま
translation: Daddy, welcome home! / I'm home.

text: お帰り / いい子にしてたか / うん、ティファと遊んでた / おー、そうかよーしよしよし
translation: Welcome back. / Were you a good girl? / Yeah, I was playing with Tifa. / Oh, is that so? Good girl, good girl.
grammar: よしよし is an affectionate expression like 'there there' or 'good good'

text: お疲れ様
translation: Good work.

text: それ、どうしたの? / 本物でしょ?珍しいね
translation: What's that? / It's real, right? That's rare.

text: え?
translation: Huh?

text: 意外だな / クラウドこんなことするんだ / 5年ぶりだ
translation: Surprising. / Cloud does things like this? / It's been 5 years.

text: 少しは変わるさ / え?
translation: People change a little. / Huh?

text: バレットに話がある / うん、入って入って
translation: I need to talk to Barret. / Yeah, come in, come in.

text: マコールが爆発したんだよ / ずっとニュースばっかりなの
translation: The Mako reactor exploded. / It's been nothing but news.
grammar: ばっかり means 'nothing but'

text: マリン / トちゃん、今夜はもうどこへも行かないから
translation: Marlene. / Daddy's not going anywhere tonight.

text: テレビ消して、念念しような
translation: Turn off the TV and let's go to sleep.
grammar: 念念しよう seems to be mishearing, likely ねんねしよう (let's sleep)

text: 片付けが終わるまでマリンの相手してあげてて / 俺が?
translation: Keep Marlene company until I finish cleaning up. / Me?
grammar: してあげて is giving favor form

text: もちろん
translation: Of course.

text: 報酬の話はティファとしてくれ
translation: Talk to Tifa about the payment.

text: 会計担当だからよ / なお、今回の攻撃に対する / 暗黒声明はおやじにならず / どうぞ、すば
translation: She's in charge of accounting. / Furthermore, regarding this attack / No dark statement has been made / Please, go ahead.

text: てめえ / バレット / 何に、何にしやがった
translation: You bastard! / Barret! / What did you do?!
grammar: しやがった is rude past tense (did something bad)

text: 知らない人とは喋っちゃダメって
translation: I was told not to talk to strangers.
grammar: ちゃダメ means 'must not'

text: えらいぞーマリー / 父ちゃんとの約束忘れなかったな
translation: Good girl, Marlene! / You remembered daddy's promise!

text: えらいえらいぞー / じゃお休みの時間も守らないとな
translation: Good girl, good girl! / Now you have to keep your bedtime too.

text: いやー父ちゃんとお話しする
translation: Nooo, I want to talk with daddy!
grammar: いやー is a whining 'no'

text: 特別だぞー
translation: Just this once, special!

text: あそうだご飯食べる / いや報酬の話をしたい
translation: Oh right, are you hungry? / No, I want to talk about payment.

text: ああそうだよね
translation: Oh, right.

text: あのねクラウド / ちょっと外で話そう
translation: Hey Cloud, / Let's talk outside for a bit.
grammar: あのね is a soft attention-getter, like 'hey' or 'you know'

text: 死んだ人は / ちゃんと星に帰れたかな
translation: The people who died... / I wonder if they properly returned to the planet.
grammar: かな expresses wondering/hoping

text: お金の話の前に聞く? / この近所にね / アパートがあって
translation: Before we talk money, want to hear something? / There's an apartment nearby...

text: 部屋が空いてるんだ / しばらくそこに寝泊まりしない?
translation: There's a room available. / Why don't you stay there for a while?
grammar: しない? is casual invitation form

text: 大谷さんが私たちの活動に好意的なの / 家賃はただ
translation: The landlady is sympathetic to our cause. / Rent is free.

text: 助かるよ / じゃあこっち
translation: That helps. / Then this way.

vocabulary.meaning: to be saved, to be helpful

text: 上どんな感じだった? / まあ、混乱していたな / だよね
translation: How was it up there? / Well, it was chaotic. / I bet.
grammar: だよね expresses agreement/confirmation

text: ごめんね、巻き込んで / 軽率だったって反省してる / 俺のことなら気にするな / これは仕事だ
translation: Sorry for getting you involved. / I regret being reckless. / Don't worry about me. / This is a job.
grammar: ごめんね is casual apology

text: うん、わかった / シンラを憎む気持ちもわかる
translation: Yeah, I understand. / I understand wanting to hate Shinra.

text: バレットたちと揉めなかった
translation: Did you have a fight with Barret and the others?

text: 向こうがどう思ったか知らないけどな / そう、心配だったんだ / クラウドは喧嘩ばかりしてたからね / そうだったかもな
translation: I don't know what they think, though. / I see, I was worried. / Cloud was always fighting. / Maybe so.
grammar: かもな is casual form of かもしれない (maybe)

text: テレビに映ってた八番街 / 映画みたいだった / ニュース番組もシンらが作ってる
translation: Sector 8 on TV... / It was like a movie. / Shinra makes the news programs too.
grammar: みたい means 'like' or 'similar to'

text: 奴らは平気で嘘も垂れ流す / じゃあ、あれも嘘だよね? / いや
translation: They broadcast lies without hesitation. / Then that was a lie too, right? / No.

text: そっか
translation: I see.
grammar: Casual contraction of そうか

text: ここなの / 名前は展望層
translation: This is it. / The name is Stargazer Heights.

text: 部屋は2階ね
translation: Your room is on the second floor.

text: この201号室が私の部屋 / でも大抵店にいるからここは眠るだけ
translation: Room 201 is my room. / But I'm usually at the bar so I just sleep here.

text: 何もなくて恥ずかしいくらい
translation: It's embarrassingly empty.
grammar: くらい here means 'to the extent that'

text: この202号室が空いてるの / もちろん大家さんにはクラウドのこと話してあるからね
translation: Room 202 is available. / Of course, I've already told the landlady about you, Cloud.
grammar: 話してある indicates action completed in preparation

text: なんて
translation: What did you say?

text: なんて
translation: What did you say?

text: 同郷の友達が部屋を探してるって / それだけ
translation: Just that a friend from the same hometown is looking for a room. / That's all.

text: まずかった / いやいいんだ / そっちは
translation: Was that bad? / No, it's fine. / And that room?

text: そこは
translation: That one is...

text: 遅いから / 明日になったら挨拶しようか
translation: It's late. / Let's greet them tomorrow.

text: とりあえず寝起きするだけなら大丈夫だよね
translation: For now, it should be fine just for sleeping, right?

vocabulary.meaning: for now, for the time being

text: 必要なものはおいおい / ああ金が必要なんだ約束は2000だよな
translation: Get what you need gradually. / Ah, I need money. The promise was 2000, right?

text: なんでもやクラウドの初仕事だから / 気持ちよくボーンと払いたいんだけど
translation: Well, it's Cloud's first job. / I'd like to pay a nice round sum, but...
grammar: ボーンと is onomatopoeia for doing something decisively

text: 500? / 作戦の準備で物入りだったから
translation: 500? / We needed a lot for mission preparations.

text: 今アバランチにはお金がないの / でも心配しないで
translation: Avalanche has no money right now. / But don't worry.

text: 明日就勤すれば確実に払えるから
translation: If we complete the next job, we can definitely pay.

text: あてにしていいんだな / 就勤を手伝ってくれたらね
translation: Can I count on that? / If you help with the job.

text: あれ? / これはまた別の依頼になるのか
translation: Huh? / Does this become a separate request?

text: いや、いい / 最初の約束の2000で手を打とう
translation: No, it's fine. / Let's settle on the original 2000.

text: つまりあと1500だ
translation: That means 1500 more.

text: 助かる
translation: That helps.

text: じゃあ明日お店でね / 今日はいろいろありがとう / おやすみなさい
translation: Then see you at the bar tomorrow. / Thanks for everything today. / Good night.

text: 203か / うーん
translation: 203, huh... / Hmm.

text: おい 大丈夫か
translation: Hey, are you okay?

text: 開けるぞ
translation: I'm coming in.
grammar: 開けるぞ announces the action about to be taken

text: クラウド / 部屋に戻ってよ
translation: Cloud! / Go back to your room!

text: 離せ
translation: Let go of me!

text: リューユニオン
translation: Reunion...
grammar: Key story term in FF7

text: この人は203号室のマルカートさん / 病気でずっとこんな感じなんだって
translation: This person is Mr. Marle from room 203. / He's been like this because of illness.

text: 時々様子を見るように / オーヤさんから頼まれてるんだ / クラウドもお願いね
translation: The landlady asked me to check on him sometimes. / Cloud, please do so too.

text: おや / あんたがクラウドだね
translation: Oh my, / You must be Cloud.

text: あたしは / おやのマーレ / で / おととい来たんだって
translation: I'm / Marle, the landlady. / And, you came the day before yesterday?

text: それまでは上かい / いろいろだ / わけありか
translation: Before that, were you up on the Plate? / Here and there. / Got some circumstances, huh?

text: ここに流れ着くのはみんなそうさね
translation: Everyone who ends up here is like that.

vocabulary.meaning: to drift to, end up at

text: 困ったことがあったら / 何でも相談しな / ティファのこともね / ティファがどうしたんだ
translation: If you have any trouble, / Come talk to me about anything. / About Tifa too. / What about Tifa?
grammar: しな is casual imperative (do it)

text: 泣かしたら承知しないってことさ / あの子は私の孫動物だ
translation: If you make her cry, you'll answer to me. / That child is like a granddaughter to me.
grammar: 承知しない expresses 'I won't let it slide'

text: 覚えておこう / ほらさっさとセブンスヘブンに追い切
translation: I'll remember that. / Now hurry up and get to Seventh Heaven.

text: ティファはとっくの昔に出かけたよ
translation: Tifa left a long time ago.

text: シンド負けちゃう / もう一回
translation: Shinra's losing! / One more time!

text: 協力者を選定中 / ウェッジの方で
translation: Currently selecting collaborators. / Wedge is handling it.

text: 危険ゲート不具合によりモンスター多数滞留中
translation: Danger: Many monsters gathered due to gate malfunction.

text: この先に用はない / 戻るかこの先に用はない / 怪我したくなけりゃ近づくんじゃねえ
translation: No business ahead. / Should I go back? No business ahead. / Don't come near if you don't want to get hurt.
grammar: たくなけりゃ is casual conditional 'if you don't want to'

text: でけえ剣だな / 強力者を選定中
translation: That's a huge sword. / Currently selecting collaborators.
grammar: でけえ is rough casual form of でかい

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

vocabulary.meaning: thank you for your hard work

text: うちの2軒隣です / エドワール両5軒 / 5番台にいる
translation: It's two houses from ours. / Edward Row 5 houses. / On platform 5.

text: 仕事に行けないことをみんな気につける / おはよう
translation: Everyone's concerned about not being able to go to work. / Good morning.

text: マリンが眠ってるの / 静かにね
translation: Marlene is sleeping. / Be quiet, okay?

text: じゃあ早速働く? / JSフィルターの交換に行きたいんだ
translation: Then shall we start working right away? / I want to go replace the JS filters.

text: ジェシーが作った汎用毒性物質除去フィルター / 水の嫌な匂いが取れるって評判で
translation: A general-purpose toxin removal filter that Jessie made. / It's popular for removing the bad smell from water.

text: この店よりずっとお金になるんだよね / この辺りのほとんどの家が使ってるから / 新しいのを持って行って / 代金と古いフィルターを回収してくる簡単なお仕事
translation: It makes way more money than this bar. / Most of the houses around here use them. / Take the new ones, collect the payment and the old filters. Simple job.

text: 聞いてる? / ああ、勘弁してくれ
translation: Are you listening? / Yeah, give me a break.
grammar: 勘弁してくれ means 'give me a break' or 'spare me'

text: 揉め事がないなら俺の出番はない / 踏み倒す気満々の人もいるんだ
translation: If there's no trouble, I'm not needed. / There are people who are totally planning to skip out on payment.

vocabulary.meaning: to skip out on payment, default
totally intent on, fully prepared to

text: ね?お守り代わり
translation: Right? You're like an amulet.

text: さっさと片付けるか
translation: Let's get this done quickly.

text: ありがとう / ついでにスラムを案内するね
translation: Thank you. / I'll show you around the slums while we're at it.

text: 回収した代金はそのまま受け取って / 来たばかりで何かと入りようでしょ? / 助かる
translation: Just keep the money you collect. / You just arrived and probably need money, right? / That helps.

text: それでも足りない分は後で渡すね
translation: I'll give you the rest later.

text: 今バレットもお金をかき集めてるから / 今日中にもらえるなら構わない
translation: Barret is also scraping together money right now. / I don't mind if I get it today.

text: 上から仕入れたアイテムもあるよ / アイテム屋といえばここ / お手紙
translation: We also have items from up above. / When it comes to item shops, this is the place. / Letter.

text: こんにちは / JSフィルターの交換です / ディファちゃん、いらっしゃい / 待ってたよ
translation: Hello. / Here for the JS filter replacement. / Tifa! Welcome! / I was waiting.

text: あれ?そいつは? / 集金係のクラウドです
translation: Huh? Who's that? / This is Cloud, the money collector.

text: お代は彼に / あんた、うまいことやったな
translation: Pay him. / You did well for yourself, huh?
grammar: やったな implies accomplishment, often with slight jealousy

text: その役目、変わってくれよ / あんたには無理だ
translation: Trade places with me for that role. / That's beyond you.

text: ん?
translation: Hm?

text: クラウド!
translation: Cloud!

text: そうだ せっかくだから買い物すれば
translation: Oh right, since you're here, why not do some shopping?

vocabulary.meaning: since the opportunity, while you're at it

text: 見るだけ見てみよう
translation: Let's just take a look.

text: おまけ
translation: Bonus.

text: 俺にはどうだろう / うーん もう少し愛想よくする?
translation: Would I get one? / Hmm, maybe be a bit friendlier?

text: おまけ目当てで? ありえない / うふふ
translation: Just for a bonus? No way. / Hehe.

text: じゃあ 次の集金は 展望層の大家さん
translation: Next collection is from the landlady at Stargazer Heights.

text: もうあった / じゃあ人柄は知ってるよね? / アバランチの大事な協力者だから 愛想よく ね?
translation: You already met? / Then you know what she's like, right? / She's an important Avalanche supporter, so be friendly, okay?

text: マーレさん / フィルター交換です
translation: Ms. Marle. / Filter replacement.

text: ピーパー / 待ってたよ
translation: Tifa! / I was waiting!

text: おや / あんたもいたのか / 仕事だ
translation: Oh, you're here too. / It's work.

text: 顔
translation: Face.
grammar: Short comment, probably about Cloud's expression

text: 集金係を頼んだの / ちゃんとお守りよ
translation: I asked him to help collect money. / He's like my bodyguard.

text: 私結構強いからそれは大丈夫 / 知ってるよ
translation: I'm actually pretty strong, so that's fine. / I know.

text: でもクラウドにやらせないと / こんな愛想なしだもの
translation: But I need to have Cloud do it. / He's so unfriendly.

text: 戦うことくらいしか取り柄がないんだろ / そんなことは
translation: Fighting is about all I'm good for. / That's not...

text: 顔
translation: Face.

text: 最善を尽くす / 吐きがないね
translation: I'll do my best. / That's not convincing.
grammar: 迫力がない might be the intended phrase (lacking force/conviction)

text: 疲れてんのかい / だったら部屋でしっかり寝るんだよ
translation: Are you tired? / If so, get some proper sleep in your room.

text: スラムの心得その1 / ね / そういうこと
translation: Slum lesson number one. / Right? / Exactly.

text: 手を出しな / マーレさんありがとう
translation: Hold out your hand. / Thank you, Ms. Marle.

text: じゃあ行くね
translation: Well, I'm off then.

text: 稼いでおいで
translation: Go make some money!
grammar: 稼いでおいで is casual command with おいで (go and come back)

text: マーレさんのおかげですぐここになれたんだ / ここは長いのか
translation: Thanks to Ms. Marle, I quickly got used to this place. / Have you been here long?

text: もう5年かな
translation: About 5 years now, I guess.
grammar: かな expresses uncertainty

text: そんな話より、就勤就勤! 次が最後の武器屋さん
translation: Never mind that, let's work! The weapon shop is the last one.

text: えい!あのフィルター全然効果ないぞ! / 申し訳ございません! ではこちらのフィルターを試してください / もういらないから帰ってくれ
translation: Hey! That filter doesn't work at all! / I'm very sorry! Please try this filter instead. / I don't want it anymore, just leave.

vocabulary.reading: もうしわけございません

text: 残念です / ではここまでの生産お願いします
translation: That's unfortunate. / Please pay for the ones up until now.

text: なんだ / 効果ゼロなのに払うかよ
translation: What? / Pay when it had zero effect?
grammar: 払うかよ is emphatic refusal 'why would I pay?'

text: 代金は彼に / 世の中舐めてるんじゃねえぞ
translation: Pay him. / Don't think you can get away with this.
grammar: 舐めてるんじゃねえぞ is rough warning 'don't underestimate...'

text: 払うよな
translation: You're going to pay, right?
grammar: 払うよな is intimidating confirmation

text: ありがとうございました
translation: Thank you very much.

text: これでフィルター交換はおしまい / お代も受け取ったし / 武器見てみる / それよりバレットの集金はいつ終わるんだ
translation: That's the end of the filter exchanges. / Got the payment too. / Want to look at weapons? / More importantly, when will Barret's collection be done?

text: 今晩の開店前には / それまでまだ時間があるけどどうする?
translation: Before opening tonight. / There's still time until then—what do you want to do?

text: そうだな / あのねアイデアがあるんだけど
translation: Let me think... / Well, I have an idea.
grammar: あのね is a conversation starter

text: 聞く? / 本格的に何でも屋を始めるなら / まず縁を作るべきだと思う
translation: Want to hear? / If you're seriously going to be a handyman, you should build connections first.

text: ご縁はお金より大事だから
translation: Connections are more important than money.

text: スラムの心得か
translation: Is that a slum lesson?

text: エンが仕事を呼んで / いい仕事をすれば評判が立って
translation: Connections bring work. / Do good work and you build a reputation.

text: それがまたエンを呼ぶの / どうすればいい
translation: And that brings more connections. / What should I do?

text: うーん / 自警団の仕事を肩代わりとか
translation: Hmm, maybe take on some neighborhood watch work?

text: ほぼボランティアだけど / エンは繋がるよ / やってみよう
translation: It's mostly volunteer work, but it builds connections. / Let's try it.

text: 詰め書は誰もいなかったから / 上に行ってみよう
translation: There was no one at the station, so let's go upstairs.

text: チンピラに見せる品はねえ / 行った行った!
translation: We've got nothing to show punks. / Get out of here!

text: ルキア、覗いて行かないかい? / スラムで暮らすなら一人に一つ、ルキア持とう!
translation: Hey, want to take a look? / If you live in the slums, everyone should have one!

text: 瓦礫通りのモンスター、何とかしら… / あっ、今日は二人が当番なんだ / あっ、もしかしてクラウドさん、入団希望すか?
translation: Do something about the monsters on Rubble Street... / Oh, those two are on duty today. / Oh, are you wanting to join, Cloud?

text: 場合によってはな、時系団は何をするんだ?
translation: Maybe. What does the neighborhood watch do?

text: うん、いろいろあるけど、まず、居住区に紛れ込むモンスターを退治したり、住民に自衛法を教えたり、それがメインだ。
translation: Well, there's various things, but mainly we exterminate monsters that get into residential areas and teach residents self-defense.

vocabulary.meaning: to sneak into, get mixed in

text: 自分の身は自分で守る。これ、スラムの心やっす。
translation: Protect yourself by yourself. That's the slum way.

text: クラウドには実績が必要なの。いい評判、いい声、それを自警団で作れないかなと思って。 / もってこいの話があるっす。
translation: Cloud needs to build a track record. Good reputation, good word of mouth. I thought he could build that with the watch. / I've got the perfect thing.

text: 俺たちじゃ、お手上げのモンスターだ。金は出せないが、俺らなりの礼はする。
translation: There's a monster we can't handle. Can't pay, but we'll show our gratitude in our own way.

vocabulary.meaning: to give up, beyond one's ability

text: そうだな / まずはその剣
translation: I see. / First, that sword.

text: 配造してないだろ
translation: You haven't modified it, right?

text: 小細工なんていらない / それなんかの誓いか / 改造すればあんたもっと強くなるぜ
translation: I don't need tricks. / Is that some kind of oath? / If you modify it, you could get even stronger.

text: おせっかいだろうけど手順を教えるな
translation: This might be meddlesome, but I'll teach you the procedure.

text: できたか / まあ使いながらいろいろ試してみるんだな
translation: Done? / Well, try various things while using it.

text: それから俺らなりの霊その2 / なんでも屋の宣伝だ
translation: And here's our thanks, part 2. / Advertising for your handyman business.

text: ウェッジがいればすぐにスラムに知れ渡るよ / クラウドさんのためなら腹ペコでも街中を練り歩くっす
translation: If Wedge is on it, the whole slum will know quickly. / For Cloud, I'd walk around town even on an empty stomach.

text: でモンスターはどこにいる / 瓦礫通りだ
translation: So where are the monsters? / Rubble Street.

text: 頼んだぞ / クラウド? / 一緒に行くね / 一人で十分だ
translation: I'm counting on you. / Cloud? / I'll go with you. / I'm enough alone.

text: でも
translation: But...

text: 道知らないでしょ / 頼む
translation: You don't know the way, do you? / Please.

text: 任せて / スラムで一番のガイドよ
translation: Leave it to me. / I'm the best guide in the slums.

text: このような
translation: (Music/ambient sound)

text: そうなところだ ゴミもモンスターも増える
translation: It's a place like this. Trash and monsters increase.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: お! 勝負有り!
translation: Oh! Victory!
grammar: 勝負有り is a martial arts declaration of victory

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: クラウドがいればモンスターなんてもう怖くないね / ティファもなぁ 正直驚いた
translation: With Cloud around, monsters aren't scary anymore. / Tifa too—honestly I'm surprised.

text: スラムにもらえたからね / 自分のには自分がいる / 待って これはスラムの心は何もある / 終わりだ 覚えるのか / ここで暮らすんです 山だ
translation: I had to in the slums. / Protect yourself by yourself. / Wait, is this slum lesson number something? / That's the end. Are you going to memorize them? / If I'm going to live here, I have to.

text: さ もう一人一貫
translation: Well, one more thing to do.

vocabulary.meaning: one task, a piece of work

text: そろそろモンスターは片付いたかな / どうせすぐ湧いてくる
translation: The monsters should be cleared out soon, right? / They'll just spawn again anyway.

text: 後ろ向きだな / 束の間でもこの街に平和をもたらしました
translation: That's pessimistic. / Even if briefly, you've brought peace to this town.

text: めでたしめでたしでしょ / そうか
translation: And they lived happily ever after, right? / I guess so.

vocabulary.meaning: and they lived happily ever after

grammar: Traditional story ending phrase

text: すぐに評判が広まると思うよ / さあ ビッグスたちのところに戻ろう
translation: I think your reputation will spread quickly. / Now, let's get back to Biggs and the others.

text: このような
translation: (Music/ambient)

text: 見て見て!最新のモンスター討伐数だよ! / なんでもやにゃながれき通りのモンスター! / 猫そぎ倒すぞよ!
translation: Look, look! The latest monster kill count! / The handyman took care of the monsters on Rubble Street! / Totally wiped them out!

text: もう戻ったのか? / ちゃんと倒したよ! / 言い渡す限り猫そぎ!
translation: Back already? / We beat them properly! / Every last one we could find!

text: さすがの早技っす!
translation: That was fast work!

text: 助かったよ! / 俺らもしっかり宣伝しといたぞ!
translation: Thanks! / We advertised you properly too!

text: そうらしいな / だが、一体どう伝えたんだ? / まあまあ / 仕事を真面目にこなしていれば評判はどんどん上がっていくよ
translation: So I heard. / But what exactly did you tell them? / Now now. / If you do your work seriously, your reputation will keep improving.

text: 剣の調子どうだ?
translation: How's the sword?

text: いい剣だな / お前との絆を感じる
translation: It's a good sword. / I feel a bond with you.

text: ずっと一緒
translation: Together forever.

text: クラウド?
translation: Cloud?

text: なんでもない
translation: It's nothing.

text: 村を出てからのこと聞きたいな
translation: I want to hear about what happened after you left the village.

text: 退屈な話だ / それでも聞きたい / まだ時間あるし仕事探しがてらどう?
translation: It's a boring story. / I still want to hear it. / We still have time, how about while looking for work?

text: 俺も俺も行くっす / ウィッチはダメだ
translation: Me too, me too, I'll come! / Wedge, you can't.

text: ウィッチまた今度ね
translation: Wedge, maybe next time.

text: ひどいっす / ちょっとは気をつかえよ / 幼馴染の久々の再会だろうが
translation: That's harsh! / Show some consideration. / It's a reunion of childhood friends after a long time.

text: 仕事を始める前に新しい武器を調達すれば?
translation: Before starting work, why not get some new weapons?

text: 必要ない / 武器屋さんもクラウドの評判を聞いてれば歓迎してくれるよ / 行くだけ行ってみよう
translation: Not necessary. / If the weapon shop heard about Cloud's reputation, they'll welcome him. / Let's at least go.

text: 瓦礫通りのモンスター / 悪いことしたら容赦しないわ
translation: Monsters on Rubble Street! / I won't go easy on anyone who misbehaves!
grammar: 容赦しない means 'show no mercy'

text: 子供たちの憧れだって言われるのよ / 本当に強いの?
translation: I'm told I'm the children's idol! / Is she really strong?

text: おいあんた
translation: Hey you.

text: どんなモンスターも倒す / なんでもやなんだって
translation: He defeats any monster. / He's a handyman.

text: 早速評判になってるみたい / だとしたら
translation: Sounds like you're already famous. / In that case...

text: さっきは悪かったよ / 武器が売れなくて気が立っててな
translation: Sorry about earlier. / I was on edge because weapons weren't selling.

text: 仕事で武器が必要じゃないかと思ってよ / よかったらそいつを使ってくれよ
translation: I figured you might need weapons for work. / Use this if you want.

text: 詫び代わりだ / 強え奴が使えばうちの宣伝になる / よろしくな
translation: Consider it an apology. / If a strong guy uses it, it's advertising for us. / Thanks.

text: どうだ他のも見ていかないか
translation: How about it? Want to look at the others?

text: 見るだけだ
translation: Just looking.

text: また寄ってくれよな
translation: Come again!

text: 新しい武器も用意したことだし お仕事始めよ
translation: Now that we've got new weapons, let's start work.

text: まずはワイマーさんのところに行ってみない? / 誰だ?
translation: First, let's visit Mr. Wymer? / Who's that?

text: 時系団に来る依頼をまとめてる人 / ほら 何でも屋の仕事が見つかるかも
translation: The person who organizes requests that come to the neighborhood watch. / Look, we might find handyman work.

text: どこにいる? / そろそろ詰書に戻ってきてると思う
translation: Where is he? / He should be back at the station by now.

text: 今月のモンスター動物数が出たよ / 協力者を選定中
translation: This month's monster kill count is out! / Currently selecting collaborators.

text: やあティファ君困りがとかい
translation: Hey Tifa! Having trouble?

text: いえ強力な助っつを紹介したくて
translation: No, I wanted to introduce a powerful helper.

text: 何でも家のクラウドです / おお頼もしいね
translation: This is Cloud, a handyman. / Oh, impressive!

text: 街の安全と幸せのため協力しよう
translation: Let's work together for the town's safety and happiness.

text: 報酬次第で危険な仕事も引き受ける / 腕に自信ありだな
translation: I'll take dangerous jobs depending on the reward. / Confident in your skills, huh?

text: うってつけの依頼を紹介するよ / 詳しい話は依頼主から聞いてくれ / 働き次第じゃ新しい依頼も紹介するよ / 助かる
translation: I'll introduce you to a perfect job. / Get the details from the client. / If you do good work, I'll introduce more jobs. / Thanks.

text: 協力者候補を発見 / 消防データの検索を開始します
translation: Potential collaborator detected. / Beginning combat data search.

text: 体験を背負いながら / 呼吸を乱さない心配機能
translation: Carrying a heavy sword. / Heart rate unaffected—excellent cardio function.

text: 筋性の取れた筋肉と骨格 / 想定外の一材です
translation: Well-balanced muscles and skeleton. / An exceptional specimen.

text: 僕はチャドリー / シンラカンパニーの科学部門で学んでいる研修生です
translation: I'm Chadley. / An intern studying in Shinra Company's science division.

text: 僕の研究にご協力ください / まずは手付金代わりです
translation: Please help with my research. / First, as a down payment.

text: その見破るマテリアを装備にセットして / バトルレポートのデータ収集をお願いします
translation: Set that Assess Materia in your equipment. / Please collect Battle Report data.

text: それで新たなマテリアを開発できるのです / シンラの仕事ならお断りだ
translation: That way I can develop new Materia. / If it's Shinra work, I refuse.

text: 僕はささやかながらシンラに反抗しようと活動しています
translation: I'm humbly working to resist Shinra.

text: あなたなら理解できるはずです / 新たなマテリアは シンラに対抗し得る力になると / どうしますか 僕を信じられないなら 切ってもらっても構いません
translation: You should understand. / New Materia could become a force to counter Shinra. / What will you do? If you can't trust me, feel free to cut me down.

text: 俺は本当に切る / つまり それまでは契約は継続ということですね
translation: I really will cut you. / So until then, our contract continues, correct?

text: バトルレポートを達成したら 必ず僕に会いに来てください
translation: When you complete the Battle Reports, please come see me.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: お疲
translation: Good work.

text: あ お姉ちゃん
translation: Oh, big sis!

text: マリンは店でお留守番?
translation: Is Marlene watching the store?

text: そっか 友達探しを手伝ってほしかったのに
translation: I see. I wanted you to help me find a friend.

text: この何でも屋のお兄さんが探してくれるって
translation: This handyman mister will find them for you.

text: 本当?
translation: Really?

text: あのね 友達の特徴は / 手足が長くてスリムでスタイル抜群 / 好きなのはご飯があるところとか おやつをくれる人がいるところとか
translation: So, the friend's features are: / Long limbs, slim, great figure. / They like places with food or people who give treats.

text: あとは隙間 友達は猫の兄弟だよ
translation: And tight spaces. The friend is a sibling cat.

text: 猫探しか / 3匹ともひとなっつっこいから 声をかければ寄ってくるよ / 絶対連れて帰ってきてね
translation: Cat search, huh? / All three are friendly, so if you call them they'll come. / Definitely bring them back!

text: 星の命ってわかる? / ライフストリーム
translation: Do you know what the planet's life is? / The Lifestream.

text: Продолжение следует...
translation: (To be continued...)
grammar: Russian text artifact from subtitles

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: チャーズレに潜んでるらしい / ウェアラットの悲鳴を聞いて助けに来るって話もある
translation: Apparently it's lurking in the tunnels. / There's talk it comes to help when it hears wererats screaming.

text: 化けネズミのくせに仲間思いなのかもな
translation: For a mutant rat, it sure cares about its friends.

text: 上から仕入れたアイテムもあるよ / アイテムのお手頃価格の品物から揃えてるよ
translation: We have items from up above too. / We stock reasonably priced goods.

text: 猫よ猫 / うちのパンをくわえてこの奥に逃げ込んだの?
translation: A cat! A cat! / It grabbed our bread and ran into the back!

text: あんたたち、捕まえてくれない?
translation: Can you catch it?

text: もう逃げられちゃったじゃない / だらしないわね
translation: It already got away! / How useless.

text: ティファちゃんの大人さんになるチャンスだった
translation: It was a chance to impress Tifa.

text: 便利屋の見習いさん / 今度頼むよ / なんだ
translation: Hey handyman apprentice. / Ask me next time. / What?

text: なんでか
translation: Why...

text: 今の家賃は払える / またモンスター / がれき通りきれいに
translation: I can pay rent now. / Monsters again. / Clean up Rubble Street.

text: お疲
translation: Good work.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: あ そうだ アイテム屋さんに途中経過を報告しようよ
translation: Oh right, let's report our progress to the item shop.

text: おい この趣味は違う / いらっしゃい / おや珍しいお客さんだ
translation: Hey, this style is different. / Welcome! / Oh, a rare customer.

text: さては買い物じゃないな / あんたが噂の何でもやだな
translation: You're not here to shop, right? / You're the rumored handyman, aren't you?

text: ま、あんたならやれそうだな / タラが廃坑場の羽トカゲども片付けて欲しいんだ / あそこは俺たちの縄張りだ
translation: Well, you look like you could do it. / I want you to clear out the drakes at the scrapyard. / That's our territory.

text: うちの常連たちはジャンクパーツのためなら危険を変えりないから心配で
translation: My regulars don't hesitate to face danger for junk parts, so I worry.

text: 引き受けよう / ありがとよ
translation: I'll take it. / Thanks.

text: お疲
translation: Good work.

text: おわり
translation: Done.

text: 上に行ってばすぐ調子に乗るし / 言わなくていいこと言うし / ほんとにおけねえやつだよ
translation: He gets cocky the moment he goes up above. / Says things he shouldn't. / What an annoying guy.
grammar: おけねえ is rough slang, likely from 置けない or similar

text: 上に引っ越したり戻る
translation: Move upstairs or come back.

text: 犯人は
translation: The culprit is...

text: あれ / 気ましてるやつだから多いね
translation: Huh? / There are a lot of unstable people, huh.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: 時計だね
translation: It's a clock.

text: 反進路組織をバランチ / 俺の獲物だからな
translation: The anti-Shinra organization Avalanche. / They're my prey.

text: 無理だぞ 帰れ / 封鎖中だ
translation: No way. Go back. / It's blocked off.

text: 羽トカゲがうろついている / あれ / ティーファちゃんが
translation: Drakes are wandering around. / Huh? / Tifa!

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: 敵の敵
translation: Enemy of my enemy...
grammar: Referring to the phrase 'enemy of my enemy is my friend'

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: 一瞬で終わりだ
translation: It'll be over in an instant.

text: この調子で行くぞ / 次は勝とう
translation: Keep this pace up! / Let's win the next one too.

text: 敵じゃない / 私たちなら余裕
translation: They're no match. / We can handle this easily.

text: 油断したな / はぁ! / 敵れ!
translation: You let your guard down! / Hah! / Run!

text: ここだ!
translation: There!

text: 今の場所に下にかける / 安全!
translation: Heading to that spot below! / Safe!

text: どれ?
translation: Which one?

text: それが来た!
translation: Here it comes!

text: 悪くない動きだ / 頼もしいな
translation: Not bad moves. / Impressive.

text: 相手になって
translation: Fight me!

text: 沈め
translation: Go down!
grammar: 沈め is imperative form

text: 撃たれろ / 私に任せて
translation: Get shot! / Leave it to me!

text: 当たる
translation: Hit!

text: 終わり / じゃあね
translation: It's over! / Bye-bye!

text: 悪くない動きだ / 頼もしいでしょ
translation: Not bad moves. / Impressive, right?

text: アイトはザコだ / 決めちゃおう
translation: They're small fry! / Let's finish this!

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: 終わり
translation: Done.

text: 悪くない動きだ / 頼もしいでしょ
translation: Not bad moves. / Impressive, right?

text: カギがかかっている
translation: It's locked.

text: 相手はザクだ / 決めちゃおう
translation: They're weaklings! / Let's finish this!

text: 気をする / 私に任せて / そこ
translation: Be careful! / Leave it to me! / There!

text: ふっ
translation: Heh.
grammar: Battle grunt

text: 揺 / 当然の結果だ
translation: Easy. / The obvious result.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: さあ行くよ!
translation: Let's go!

text: 終わり! / じゃあね! / もうな!
translation: Done! / Bye-bye! / See ya!

text: いくだけ散って! / そこ! / まだまだ!
translation: Scatter already! / There! / Not done yet!

text: 潰れなさい!
translation: Get crushed!

text: どうってことない
translation: No big deal.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: お疲
translation: Good work.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: クラウドさん / 見事データ提出一番ノリでした
translation: Cloud! / You were first to submit the data, impressively!

text: 追加報酬も差し上げます / 新しく生まれたマテリアを早速発売しました
translation: I'll give you additional rewards. / I've already released the newly created Materia.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: に対抗する力を生み出していきましょう 新たなバトルレポートを随時追加していますからこれからもご協力を / お願いします
translation: Let's create power to counter... I'm adding new Battle Reports regularly, so please continue to cooperate.

text: うまくいったね 何でもやきっと当たるよ
translation: It went well! The handyman thing will definitely work out.

text: 悪くない手応えだ 仕事は得り好みしないこと / ご縁はお金より大事なんだから / スラムの心得だろ
translation: Not bad results. Don't be picky about work. / Connections are more important than money. / That's a slum lesson, right?

text: ふふっ 馴染んできたね / 師匠がいいからな
translation: Hehe, you're fitting in. / It's because I have a good teacher.

vocabulary.meaning: to fit in, get used to

text: これからはもっと厳しく行こうかな / そうしてくれ
translation: Maybe I'll be stricter from now on. / Please do.

text: ねえ そろそろバレットの集金も終わってると思うけど / どうする? 一度店に戻る?
translation: Hey, Barret's collection should be done by now. / What do you want to do? Go back to the bar?

text: お疲 / 相手には閉店しないよね
translation: Good work. / We won't close for customers, right?

text: おう ビビって帰ってきたか / 聞いてるぜ ウェアラットは倒したってな
translation: Oh, came back scared? / I heard. You defeated the wererats.

text: だが 俺の依頼はバケネズミ / やる気があるなら バケネズミ退治を続ける / ほら そろそろ出てくるかもだ
translation: But my request is for the mutant rat. / If you're motivated, continue hunting it. / Look, it might appear soon.

text: 今度は逃げ出すなよ 何でもや
translation: Don't run away this time, handyman.

text: お疲
translation: Good work.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: お疲れ様でした
translation: Good work.

text: はい
translation: Yes.

text: てことで 支柱前に行ってみな / ヤバイモンスターが飛んできたって 騒ぎになってるらしい
translation: Anyway, go check out the pillar area. / I heard there's a commotion about a dangerous monster flying around.

text: そういうの 得意だろ?
translation: You're good at that kind of thing, right?

text: まず 己を知り その道を極めよう
translation: First, know yourself and master your path.

text: そして 振り返るんだ / 風景が違って見えるぞ
translation: And then look back. / The scenery will look different.

text: じゃあ 頑張れよ 何でもや / うちの商品は 折々で変わるから

text: どう? / どう? / 好きって言ってくれるお客さん多いんだ
translation: How is it? / How is it? / A lot of customers say they like it.
grammar: ~って言ってくれる means 'say (favorably to me)'

text: 人気なわけだ
translation: No wonder it's popular.
grammar: ~なわけだ expresses understanding the reason

text: お客様さすがお目が高い / 続きましては
translation: As expected, the customer has excellent taste. / Next up...

text: 当店名物コスモキャニオンでございます
translation: This is our specialty, the Cosmo Canyon.
grammar: でございます is very polite copula

text: 綺麗だ
translation: It's beautiful.

text: 行かなきゃ
translation: I have to go.
grammar: ~なきゃ is casual of ~なければならない (must)

text: ごゆっくり
translation: Take your time.
grammar: ご~ is honorific prefix

text: ニュース見た? / 魔晄炉の爆発は市民の敵 / アバランチの仕業だってガンガン流れてるの / ゾクゾクするよね
translation: Did you see the news? / The mako reactor explosion is an enemy of the citizens. / They're broadcasting nonstop that it's Avalanche's doing. / Thrilling, isn't it?

vocabulary.meaning: to be thrilled, to shiver with excitement

text: 顔バレしてないから / ここは安全だろうけど、いろいろ急がなくちゃ。
translation: Since our faces haven't been exposed... / This place is probably safe, but we need to hurry with various things.
grammar: ~なくちゃ is casual of ~なくてはならない (must)

text: ねえ、次も一緒なんでしょ? / 報酬次第だな。
translation: Hey, you'll be with us next time too, right? / Depends on the payment.
grammar: ~なんでしょ is seeking confirmation

text: じゃあ決まり、私が押すから。
translation: Then it's decided. I'll push for it.

text: ティファが行くことになってるんだけど、あの人思想が揺れてるっていうか、
translation: Tifa is supposed to go, but that girl's ideals are wavering, or rather...

vocabulary.word: 行くことになっている
vocabulary.reading: いくことになっている
vocabulary.meaning: is supposed to go, is scheduled to go

grammar: ~ことになっている expresses an arrangement or plan

text: 爆弾闘争にも乗り気じゃないからいざって時に。
translation: She's not enthusiastic about the bombing campaign either, so when push comes to shove...

vocabulary.meaning: when it comes to it, in a pinch

grammar: いざって時に means 'when the time comes'

text: こっちも命を預けるわけだから / それならあんたみたいな有能な人の方がいいもの
translation: We're entrusting our lives too, after all. / If that's the case, someone capable like you would be better.
grammar: ~わけだから explains the reason

text: 時間を潰すか
translation: Shall I kill some time?

text: おとなしく待つか
translation: Guess I'll wait quietly.

text: 作戦に乗り気じゃないらしいな
translation: It seems she's not enthusiastic about the mission.

text: 終わったみたい / 投げ出してきてたのか
translation: Looks like it's over. / Did you storm out?

vocabulary.meaning: to throw out, to abandon, to storm out

text: 揉めちゃって
translation: We had a disagreement.

vocabulary.meaning: to have a dispute, to quarrel

grammar: ~ちゃって is casual of ~てしまって (unfortunately did)

text: そうだ 何か飲む
translation: Oh, want something to drink?

text: ティファ 決機会だ / うまいもん たっぷり出してくれ
translation: Tifa! This is a celebration! / Bring out plenty of good food!
grammar: ~てくれ is casual request

text: 次は俺たちだけでやることにする
translation: We've decided to do the next one with just us.
grammar: ~ことにする means 'decide to'

text: お前は仕事探しでもしてるもともとそのつもりだ契約がなければ手伝う義理はないそういうと思ったぜほら残りの報酬だ気持ち上乗せしといてやったこれで晴れて契約終了ださあ悪いが席を外してくれ身内だけでやりたいんだな
translation: You go find other work. / That was my plan anyway. / Without a contract, I have no obligation to help. / I figured you'd say that. Here, the rest of your payment. I've added a little extra. This officially ends our contract. Now, please excuse yourself. We want to do this with just the group.
grammar: ~ておいてやった means 'did (as a favor)'

text: 誘ったのにごめんねみんなと話してるうちになんだろうこの逃走とは無関係のクラウドに頼りすぎかなってジェイシーまだか今行くほんとごめん気にするな回のあとでゆっくり話したいな
translation: I invited you, but I'm sorry. While talking with everyone, I don't know... I felt like we're relying too much on Cloud, who has nothing to do with this cause. / Jessie, are you coming? / Coming now! / I'm really sorry. I want to talk more after the meeting.

text: 気遣いならいい / ジェシー!我慢の限界っす!
translation: If you're just being considerate, it's fine. / Jessie! I've reached my limit!
grammar: っす is casual form of です

text: じゃあ、あとで / ごめん、お待たせ!
translation: Well then, later. / Sorry for the wait!

text: かんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばんばん
translation: (Sound effects/noise)

text: 右腕が銃になっている大男を知ってるがこの辺りに根白があるらしいどうだろうフッハッハッハッ鋭いね金の匂いを嗅ぎつけたな500でどうだ200300だ
translation: You know a big guy with a gun for a right arm? I've heard he has a hideout around here. / Really? Hahaha! You've got a nose for money. How about 500? / 200. / 300.

text: まあいいじっくり聞かせてもらうぜ
translation: Well, fine. I'll take my time hearing about it.
grammar: ~てもらう means receiving the action

text: こっちだ
translation: This way.

text: 文句アッカー見てんじゃねえ
translation: What are you looking at?! Got a problem?!
grammar: ~てんじゃねえ is rough prohibition 'don't be doing'

text: 行けい邪魔だ / はい
translation: Get going! You're in the way! / Yes.
grammar: 行けい is emphatic imperative of 行け

text: そしたら襲ったりはしねえよ
translation: Then I won't attack you or anything.
grammar: しねえ is rough negative of しない

text: 이 시각
translation: (Subtitle artifact)

text: お前は
translation: You...

text: 右腕が銃の男の話だったな / いやその
translation: It was about the man with a gun arm, right? / Well, uh...

text: なぜ探ってる / 俺は命令者のだけで
translation: Why are you investigating? / I'm just following orders...

text: 何にも知らねえんだ / だが命まじは
translation: I don't know anything. / But seriously...
grammar: 知らねえ is rough form of 知らない

text: うせろ
translation: Get lost.
grammar: Rough imperative

text: やがれ
translation: (Exclamation/curse)
grammar: Vulgar imperative suffix

text: Субтитры создавал DimaTorzok
translation: (Subtitle artifact)

text: おかえりー 遅かったね
translation: Welcome back! You were late.

text: なんつって
translation: Just kidding.

vocabulary.meaning: just kidding (casual なんて言って)

grammar: Contraction of なんて言って

text: 話があるんだけど 入れてくれない?
translation: I have something to discuss. Can you let me in?
grammar: ~てくれない? is casual request

text: じゃあ前置きはなしで
translation: Then I'll skip the preamble.

text: 今度は何の例だ / 次の作戦に押せなかったお詫び
translation: What's this about this time? / An apology for not being able to push for the next mission.

text: じゃないとしたらなんだ
translation: If not that, then what is it?
grammar: ~としたら means 'if we suppose'

text: 取引か / いい感してる
translation: A deal? / Good instincts.

text: でもこれ他のメンバーには内緒にしてよね
translation: But keep this secret from the other members, okay?
grammar: ~にしてよね is casual request

text: 今夜のうちに解決しておきたい個人的な問題なの
translation: It's a personal problem I want to resolve tonight.
grammar: ~ておきたい means 'want to do in advance'

text: 今夜?
translation: Tonight?

text: そう一緒に7番街 / プレートの7番街まで行ってほしいんだ
translation: Yes. I want you to come with me to Sector 7... to the Sector 7 Plate.
grammar: ~てほしい expresses wanting someone to do something

text: 目的は道々話すから / 俺は構わないが明日は大仕事だろ
translation: I'll explain the purpose on the way. / I don't mind, but tomorrow's a big job, right?

vocabulary.meaning: on the way, along the road

text: そうだけど今やらないともっと大変なことになるから
translation: That's true, but if we don't do it now, things will get worse.
grammar: ~ないと + negative consequence

text: ねえ 話は決まったってことでいい?
translation: Hey, can I take it that we have a deal?

vocabulary.meaning: so that means, in that case

grammar: ~ってことでいい? asks for confirmation

text: 手付金代わりね
translation: Consider this an advance payment.

text: 私の計算だと出発したら朝まで戻れない
translation: By my calculations, once we leave, we won't be back until morning.
grammar: ~たら is conditional 'once/if'

text: 準備は今のうちにしっかりね
translation: Make sure to prepare properly while you can.

text: 終わったら教えて
translation: Let me know when you're done.
grammar: ~たら is conditional

text: Субтитры создавал DimaTorzok
translation: (Subtitle artifact)

text: 準備はOK
translation: Preparations are complete.

text: ゆっくりどうぞ / なんつって / しっかり準備してきてね
translation: Take your time. / Just kidding. / Make sure you're well prepared.
grammar: ~てきてね means 'make sure to come having done'

text: 準備はOK
translation: Preparations are complete.

text: じゃあ夜になったら駅に集合 / 頼りにしてるよ
translation: Then let's meet at the station when night falls. / I'm counting on you.

vocabulary.meaning: to count on, to rely on

grammar: ~になったら is conditional 'when it becomes'

text: 報酬は悪くない。
translation: The payment isn't bad.
